author: Staff Reporter
text:
A sand-laden lorry knocked down a couple here in Shoolagiri on Monday. The victims Murugan (36) and Mariamma (30) of Indur in Dharmapuri were employed in Bengaluru.

The couple had gone home to Dharmapuri recently and were returning to Bengaluru on their two-wheeler when the incident occurred near Udhanapalli in Shoolagiri. Murugan was killed on the spot while Mariamma was admitted to a private hospital in Bengaluru, where she succumbed. The couple have a son and a daughter.
title: Couple fatally knocked down
